name: REDCap RAG
description: Enables retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) functionality in REDCap, allowing storage and querying of context documents using vector embeddings. Supports Redis or REDCap's Entity Table for flexible database management.

storeDocument.description: Store a single document/section to RAG vector database

deleteDocument.description: Delete a document from RAG vector database (both dense and sparse indexes)

purgeNamespace.description: Purge all documents in a namespace (both dense and sparse indexes)

Hybrid Search: Retrieval K
Number of dense+sparse candidates before hybrid merge

Hybrid Search: Dense Weight (0–1)
Scaling factor that determines the contribution of dense embedding similarity within the hybrid search score. Increasing this value favors semantic relevance over exact keyword matches.

Hybrid Search: Sparse Weight (0–1)
Adjusts the impact of keyword and exact-term matching in the hybrid search. Higher values prioritize precise lexical matches, while lower values emphasize semantic similarity.
